short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book meetings in the easiest way ever.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the one tool you need to book more meetings.

No more "that time's tricky," "I have a conflict," or "let me check my calendar first." 

Instead: reach your sales targets thanks to automated scheduling, and attract leads with a booking page that represents you.

lemcal is the tool that minimizes no-shows and manages your schedule on autopilot.

With the lemcal extension you can:

- schedule, reschedule, or cancel your meetings with one click
- set up and share your availability in seconds
- save time by accessing your schedule via any page on your browser

And you'll soon be able to:

- streamline your outreach by adding availability directly to Gmail and LinkedIn messages
- join your Google Meet or Zoom meeting room from any page

It's free, and it takes 1 minute to onboard. 

Start booking more meetings now.
